PluginDescription: A Voicemeeter plugin for Macro Deck
ToggleActionDescription: Toggle an option on a strip or bus
AdvancedActionDescription:
Advanced/Custom options for controlling Voicemeeter using the Voicemeeter API language.
Please read the Voicemeeter docs for instructions.
ParameterError: An error occurred while validating the parameter.
CommandActionDescription: Select a Voicemeeter command to execute
CommandError: An error occurred while validating the command.
SliderActionDescription: Change a slider by a given amount
MacroButtonIdError: Button Id is not valid. Valid values are 0 to 79
